set.name: DMART-18 Fabulous Art: Exploring the World of Amazing Creatures ~The Travels of Asebi~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Magic that costs 5 or more {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your Magics get "speed attacker". ■ Before each break of this creature, you may cast a spell that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone from your hand or graveyard for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-18 Fabulous Art: Exploring the World of Amazing Creatures ~The Travels of Asebi~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Armored that costs 5 or more {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Once per turn, whenever a creature is put, you may shieldify the top card of your deck. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that costs 7 or less that has "Bolshack" in its name from your hand. ■ Final End: At the start of your turn, you may break all your shields. If you do, you can't lose the game until the start of your next turn. ("Final End" can only be used once per game.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-18 Fabulous Art: Exploring the World of Amazing Creatures ~The Travels of Asebi~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent put a creature or cast a spell without tapping a card in their mana zone that turn, and you don't have a 'Gaiash Kaiser, the Meteor', you may summon this creature for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards. ■ Your creatures that cost 10 or more cost 4 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack you on the turn they are put.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-18 Fabulous Art: Exploring the World of Amazing Creatures ~The Travels of Asebi~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent put a creature without tapping a card in their mana zone that turn, you may put this creature from your graveyard. ■ When you put this creature, if your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-18 Fabulous Art: Exploring the World of Amazing Creatures ~The Travels of Asebi~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent discards a card at random from their hand: ► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-18 Fabulous Art: Exploring the World of Amazing Creatures ~The Travels of Asebi~
